config_name: Binary Frequency - last meal 3+ hours before bedtime 5 of 7 days

configuration_json.formula: if (days_meeting_timing >= required_days) then success_value else failure_value

schema.description: SC-BINARY-FREQUENCY: Success requires finishing last meal at least 3 hours before bedtime on at least 5 of 7 days per week

metadata.recommendation_text: Finish your final meal at least 3 hours before bedtime on at least 5 days per week

analysis.reasoning: SC-BINARY-FREQUENCY: Meal timing is binary (within window or not) with weekly frequency pattern
